trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents time in divisions, such as months, days, and years.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxx xx xxxxxx$ xxxx$ xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Years are calculated using the Gregorian calendar, while days and months are calculated using the lunisolar calendar.
